results.title: Biden Signs Orders to Expand Food Stamps and Raise Wages, but Says Economy Needs More Help

results.abstract: President Biden said there was “no need” for former President Donald J. Trump to get the briefings, traditionally given to ex-presidents as a courtesy and to keep them informed if their advice is needed.

results.title: Trump Was Sicker Than Acknowledged With Covid-19
results.abstract: When he was hospitalized with the coronavirus in October, his blood oxygen levels had plunged and officials feared he was on the verge of being placed on a ventilator.

media.caption: President Donald J. Trump arriving at Walter Reed National Military Medical Center in October after testing positive for the coronavirus.

results.byline: By Carl Zimmer, Noah Weiland and Sharon LaFraniere
results.title: Johnson & Johnson’s Vaccine Offers Strong Protection but Fuels Concern About Variants
results.abstract: The vaccine’s efficacy rate dropped from 72 percent in the United States to just 57 percent in South Africa, where a highly contagious variant is driving most cases.

media.caption: A dose of Johnson & Johnson’s vaccine candidate was prepared at the Rocky Mountain Regional VA Medical Center in Aurora, Colo., last month.

results.adx_keywords: Vaccination and Immunization;Coronavirus (2019-nCoV);Ethics and Official Misconduct;Doctors;Gokal, Hasan (1972- );Bynum, Franklin;Ogg, Kim;Texas
results.title: The Vaccine Had to Be Used. He Used It. He Was Fired.
results.abstract: Ten doses of the Covid-19 vaccine would expire within hours, so a Houston doctor gave it to people with medical conditions, including his wife. What followed was “the lowest moment in my life,” Dr. Hasan Gokal said.

media.caption: Dr. Hasan Gokal at home in Sugar Land, Tex. He has faced a scandal over his administration of the coronavirus vaccine.
media.copyright: Brandon Thibodeaux for The New York Times

results.abstract: The Texas senator faced fierce blowback for fleeing his state as a disaster unfolded. Text messages sent by his wife revealed a hastily planned trip away from their “FREEZING” family home.
